annonstext:
Are you committed to a sustainable future? Come join one of the leading global environmental service companies. 

Job description  

At Mellifiq, we work daily with treatment processes for air and water within a number of applications and industries. We have a great focus on the real-estate business as well as municipal and industrial facilities such as biogas plants and wastewater treatment plants. Our deliveries are often complex, complete solutions combining the best available technology, which may comprise oxidation processes, filtration systems and catalytic treatment of stable compounds which present significant hazard to our environment.

We operate in a range of large and small projects, often with a commitment that includes entire contracts or partial deliveries with responsibility for parts or the entire purification process.

We have a strong need to reinforce our competence within both private and public tenders, both in Sweden and internationally. You will work as a key person in close collaboration with our technical Project Sales Engineers, Process and Project Engineers where we deliver projects within both air and water purification in a number of areas, such as industry, municipal and real estate. You will be responsible for finding, and bidding on procurement projects in these areas.

You will be responsible of finding suitable key projects within the framework of our core business and bid for these with complete documentation for the customer. This includes, among other things:

	Coordinate with technical experts internally regarding the extent of the tender
	Handling of required documents
	If necessary, technical calculations for our solutions
	Pricing and financial calculations towards end customers
	Actively find suitable projects in public and private procurement registers globally

Candidate Profile  

We believe you are a doer and a problem solver. You are not afraid to take responsibility and ask questions. We are a digital organization and you need to have a technical interest and knowledge how to work in digital tools. We believe in learning by doing and personal growth at work, there is good possibilities to develop both your own knowledge and your position in the company.   

Qualifications 

	Education in technology, production, logistics at university level
	Excellent knowledge in Microsoft Office, Word and Excel
	At least 2 years’ experience of public and private tenders on the supplier side
	Good understanding of industrial equipment and processes
	Driver’s license
	Fluent in Swedish and proficient in English, both oral and written

Merits 

	Experience of working for a fast-growing company
	Previous experience in CRM-systems
	Experience in working in the manufacturing industry
	International work experience

Interested?

Contact us if you want to be a part of our team, or if you have any questions regarding this position or the company.

Start: As soon as possible

Scope: Full time

Last application day: Selection takes place continuously

Contact person: FIRSTNAME LASTNAME 

Your application must include personal letter and resume. Applications are only reviewed when sent through our application form on Mellifiq careersite. 

Please note that we read applications continuously and the position may be filled before end of application deadline.

About Mellifiq 

Mellifiq is a multi-awarded environmental service company group, that has since the early nineties evolved into a world leading system and solution provider with multiple groundbreaking applications for industrial, municipal, and real estate clients. We supply cutting-edge technologies to manage the most sophisticated air, water, and energy challenges.

Mellifiq offers a complete range of air and water treatment technologies and solutions across multiple industries such as processing industry, energy sector, food and beverage, pharmaceutical, wastewater treatment and commercial real estate.

Mellifiq offers strong and renowned brands, such as Ozonetech, Nodora and Watermaid, and world-class engineering services combined an excellent track record of more than 40 years of innovation. We help our clients achieve the most efficient and sustainable solutions while creating the maximum value for their businesses.

With several business units across Europe, Mellifiq is headquartered in Stockholm where research and development, production, Q&A and certification all take place. Our unique technology and our extensive expertise have made us the Center of Excellence for the world’s most complex projects, and a global player with installations on all six continents.

Everyday millions of people rely on our solutions for ventilation, disinfection, sanitation, and odor control. We are committed to raising the bar for the concept of clean and the industry standard for engineering, technical services and general contracting.
